text:
Pennsylvania: @PennieOfficial wraps up 2022 OEP with 374.8K QHPs, up 11% y/y!
Wed, 01/19/2022 - 10:39am
With the dust having settled on the finaldeadline for the 2022 ACA Open Enrollment Period in Pennsylvania,their ACAexchange, Pennie, has posted a slideshow with their enrollment data(along with other important wonky info).
I've included two of the key slides below, but there's a bunch of other demographic breakout stuff at the link above...financial assistance breakout, metal tiers, net premium data, etc.
The main number: As of 1/15/21, 374,776 PA residents had selected or re-enrolled inQualified Health Plans (QHPs) for 2022. This is up 11.0% vs. last year's final OEP total:
 
That final mini-enrollment spike in the last couple of days of Open Enrollment is worth noting:
